short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to search YouTube videos by typing in the search bar immediately on page load. That's it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to search YouTube videos by typing in the search bar immediately on page load. That's it! All there is to it. It just focuses the search input field so you can immediately start typing without using the mouse or pressing tab X amount of times.
